title.value: Can ChatGPT Pass An Introductory Level Functional Language Programming Course?
title.justification: It is the official title of the paper.
title.quote: Can ChatGPT Pass An Introductory Level Functional Language Programming Course?

extractions.description: This paper explores the performance of ChatGPT in an introductory-level functional programming course by systematically evaluating its ability to complete homework and exams. The study also investigates the potential benefits and limitations of using ChatGPT as a learning assistant.

type.justification: The paper performs systematic evaluation and experiments to assess ChatGPT’s performance in a functional programming course.
type.quote: In our systematic evaluation, we treated ChatGPT as one of our students and demonstrated that it can achieve a grade B- and its rank in the class is 155 out of 314 students overall.

name.justification: The study focuses on the impact of ChatGPT on educational settings, specifically in a functional programming course.
name.quote: This paper aims to explore how well ChatGPT can perform in an introductory-level functional language programming course.

name.justification: The study involves the use of ChatGPT, which is based on natural language processing techniques.
name.quote: Models such as GPT-3 and its variants seemingly understand and respond to user input in a conversational manner based on the given prompt.

name.justification: The paper evaluates a deep learning model (ChatGPT) specifically designed for various tasks, including computer programming.
name.quote: The recent introduction of ChatGPT has drawn significant attention from both industry and academia due to its impressive capabilities in solving a diverse range of tasks, including language translation, text summarization, and computer programming.

name.justification: ChatGPT is the main focus of the study.
name.quote: One of the most notable large language models is ChatGPT, which has garnered significant attention due to its ability to engage in conversational interactions with users and incorporate previous chat history into its responses.

is_contributed.justification: ChatGPT was developed by OpenAI, not by the authors of this paper.
is_contributed.quote: One of the most notable large language models is ChatGPT, which has garnered significant attention due to its ability to engage in conversational interactions with users and incorporate previous chat history into its responses.

is_executed.justification: The study evaluates the performance of ChatGPT on programming tasks.
is_executed.quote: In our systematic evaluation, we treated ChatGPT as one of our students and demonstrated that it can achieve a grade B- and its rank in the class is 155 out of 314 students overall.

is_compared.justification: ChatGPT’s performance is compared to the performance of actual students.
is_compared.quote: By comparing the results between the unassisted and assisted setting, we can determine the extent to which the quality of ChatGPT’s answers can be improved through guided learning.

referenced_paper_title.justification: The referenced paper is related to the family of models ChatGPT belongs to.
referenced_paper_title.quote: Models such as GPT-3 and its variants seemingly understand and respond to user input in a conversational manner based on the given prompt.
